package.name: Psquared_PriceRounding
package.summary: Price rounding for a product catalog in Magento.
package.description:
This tiny extension allows to round the prices in the product catalog to force integer values instead of ugly decimal values. This is helpful in combination with currency convertion.
Example: 100 € => USD 131.26 With enabled price rounding the price will be USD 131.00
Features:
- Enable or disable the price rounding per store view. - Choose the rounding method per store view: round, ceil, floor (see math functions in PHP manual for more informations.)
GitHub Repository: https://github.com/patrickbaber/Psquared_PriceRounding
